sentences.sentence: The news is not just a product; the press is the fourth estate, a pillar of the polity.
sentences.translation: 新闻不是一件产品；新闻产业作为社会的第四阶层，是国家政体的支柱。

sentences.sentence: This polity of ours will not change.
This polity lifted Chinese exports of silk.
sentences.translation: 这项政策提高了中国丝绸的出口量。
